interface.name: S.C.O.U.R.G.E.
interface.summary: rogue-like game in the tradition of NetHack and Moria
interface.description: S.C.O.U.R.G.E. is a rogue-like game in the fine tradition of NetHack and Moria. It sports a graphical front-end, similar to glHack or the Falcon's eye. I tried to design the 3D UI as a best of both worlds from old to new: It lets you rotate the view, zoom in/out, view special effects, etc. On the other hand I've always liked the old-school isometric games like Exult or Woodward
